channel.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
channel.description:
I've just bought my ticket for the Life Time Value Conf for Self-funded Founders http://ltvconf.com/
Just wondered if anyone is going to Brighton?

item.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
I’ve also just heard of this for the first time. Conference organisers, next time please post well in advance in this forum! I for one would be grateful!

It looks like a good roster of speakers.

Read full topic

item.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
item.dc:creator: andycroll
item.description:
We’re aware of the issue of ‘a circuit’ - a similar thing happens in the world of my other conference http://brightonruby.com.

So we’ve tried to add some local ‘unheard’ flavour as well as names you might recognise. Of course in the world of the internet, one person’s ‘famous’ is another’s ‘who the hell is that’.

Read full topic

item.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
item.dc:creator: aeden
item.description:
There is definitely some crossover, which is largely due to the fact that there are a small number of bootstrapped small businesses that actually talk about their businesses in depth.

FWIW, I’ll be speaking and I’ve never spoken at a MicroConf, so there’s that.

Read full topic

item.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
item.dc:creator: pjc
item.description:
I love that it’s single track. So annoying to be only one of your company at a conference and having to pick talks.

Seems like it’s always the same bootstrapper crowd going to all these conferences. Is there really much of a difference between say MicroConf US vs MicroConf Europe vs Bacon Biz Conf vs LTV Conf?

Off topic: I just realized Joanna Wiebe (CopyHackers) and Jane Portman (UI Audit) are two different people.

Read full topic

item.title: LTV Conf Brighton 6th of July
item.dc:creator: avdi
item.description:
As a former speaker at Andy Croll’s Brighton Ruby conference, I am shocked and appalled that I just heard about this. Alas, setting off for the UK with three weeks of notice simply isn’t in the cards Next year!

Read full topic
